summary: Consume Zulip API to perform various operations like sending messages, updating messages, and managing streams and users.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (Message, Stream, User).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (Delete, Get, Send Private, Send to Stream, Update, Upload a File).

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Specify the destination stream or recipients' usernames for sending private messages.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content of the message to be sent.

parameters.name: stream
parameters.description: Select the destination stream for sending messages.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Select the topic of the message when sending to a stream.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the message to be updated.

parameters.name: updateFields
parameters.description: Specify the fields to update in the message.

parameters.content: Hello, this is a private message.
